brainly_data.question:
The black rhinoceros of Africa is critically endangered due to poaching and its low reproductive rate. Poachers illegally kill black rhinos for their distinctive and highly valued nose horns. Which area of expertise would be helpful in changing the behavior of poachers?

A. Physics
B. Chemistry
C. Anthropology
D. Geology
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question:
The black rhinoceros of Africa is critically endangered due to poaching and its low reproductive rate. Poachers illegally kill black rhinos for their distinctive and highly valued nose horns. Which area of expertise would be helpful in changing the behavior of poachers?

A. Physics
B. Chemistry
C. Anthropology
D. Geology
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: The answer would be D) Anthropology.  Anthropology is the study of humanity, involving societies and cultures.  This relates to changing the behavior of poachers.  Hope this helps!
